name: Until Destruction
description:
You drive one of the five cars in the arena, each with the goal to get as many points as possible by crashing the other cars but also to avoid as much damage as possible to survive for a long time.

You can choose from five car types, each with a different speed, handling, strength and resistance.

Take power ups to improve your car, but try to do it quickly because your opponents want them as well.

Special opponents will show up once in a while to spice up the show, if you want to drive for a long time, avoid them and their weapons.

Use the arrow keys to go quicker, to brake, to drive backwards and to steer left and right respectively, press the space button to use your turbo. You can also use the mouse for those things but it probably is easier with keys.
